hero.mainTitle: Bring the Magic of Christmas to Your Home!
hero.text: Discover the best selection of Christmas decorations and toys.

promotions.title1: Buy 3 ornaments – get the fourth free!
promotions.title3: Free delivery for orders over 200 zł
promotions.desc1: When you buy three Christmas ornaments, you'll receive the fourth completely free.
promotions.desc2: Take advantage of a discount on our Christmas decoration sets and save 15%.
promotions.desc3: Spend at least 200 zł and enjoy free delivery within Poland.

about.text1: Welcome to our magical world of Christmas decorations! We offer unique Christmas ornaments that bring the magic of the holidays to your home.
about.text2: Each ornament is crafted with attention to the smallest detail, adding a unique character and the warmth of holiday spirit to your Christmas tree.

advantages.desc1: Our Christmas ornaments captivate with unique designs that highlight the magic of your holidays.
advantages.desc2: We use only environmentally friendly materials, caring for nature and your health.
advantages.desc3: We ensure express delivery so that your decorations arrive on time.

products.desc1: Elegant and shiny glass ornaments that add magic to any Christmas tree.
products.desc2: Glittering golden stars, perfect for decorating your Christmas tree.
products.desc3: Unique hand-painted ornaments that will give your Christmas tree a special character.
products.desc4: Energy-saving LED lights that brighten every holiday.
products.desc5: Beautiful snowflake-shaped decorations that add charm to any interior.
products.desc6: Ornaments decorated with glitter that shine on your Christmas tree.
products.desc7: Miniature trees perfect for decorating your Christmas table.
products.desc8: A set of diverse ornaments in vibrant colors.
products.desc9: Star-shaped decorations with built-in LED lights.

cookie.text2: Świąteczny Slot uses cookies to improve your experience on our site and provide more personalized services.
cookie.text3: Cookies are small files stored on your device by our website. They improve site functionality and optimize the user experience.
cookie.text4: You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of certain site features.
cookie.text5: By using our site, you agree to the use of cookies as described in this policy. If you have any questions about cookies, contact us at kontakt@swiatecznyslot.com
cookie.item1: To monitor the performance of our site and improve your user experience.
cookie.item2: To remember your settings so we can provide better services.
cookie.item3: Essential cookies: Required for basic site functionality, such as remembering your shopping cart or login data.
cookie.item4: Analytical cookies: Used to monitor site usage and improve its performance.

warunki.text2: Welcome to swiatecznyslot.com By using our site, you accept the terms of use outlined below.
warunki.text3: All content on this site, including images and logos, is the property of swiatecznyslot.com. Using content without our permission is prohibited.
warunki.text4: We are not responsible for any damages arising from the use of our site or services provided by us.
warunki.text5: We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Continuing to use the site after changes indicates acceptance of the new terms.
warunki.text6: If you have any questions, contact us at kontakt@swiatecznyslot.com
warunki.item1: To use our services and make purchases, you must be at least 18 years old.
warunki.item2: You agree to use our site in compliance with applicable laws.

privacy.text2: Świąteczny Slot (we, us, our) respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data while using our website.
privacy.text3: We do not share your personal data with third parties unless required by law.
privacy.text4: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site and provide more personalized services.
privacy.text5: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal data.
privacy.text6: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data.
privacy.text7: If you have questions about privacy, please contact us at kontakt@swiatecznyslot.com
privacy.item1: Personal data you provide (name, email address, etc.).

footer.text: Świąteczny Slot - swiatecznyslot.com. All rights reserved.

cookieBanner.text: This site uses cookies to improve your experience.

thankYou.title: Thank You!
thankYou.text: Your message has been successfully sent. We will contact you shortly.
